description: This file appears to be a Python source code file implementing functions related to emitting C++ code, specifically for JSON-RPC bindings and event handling. It contains functions for generating code structures, method prototypes, registration/unregistration routines, and event handling mechanisms for a JSON RPC system.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates C++ code for emitting a JSON-RPC event, including the function prototype and body with JSON conversion logic and call mechanisms.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Generates the preamble of the C++ source file, including includes, namespace declarations, and version code.

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Closes namespaces and completes the code structure after the registration functions.

methods.name: _EmitVersionCode(emit, version)
methods.description: Emits C++ namespace with version constants to embed version info.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Generates the core registration function for JSON-RPC, including method registration, signal handling, and event registration.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Main entry point that invokes code emission and wraps the core registration code with prologue and epilogue.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Emits version info code and calls the registration prologue and epilogue.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
